step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to stretch your arm overhead, the significant variation in right elbow and wrist MAE across repetitions suggests inconsistent arm extension. Focus on keeping your arm straight and maintaining a consistent posture throughout the exercise.
The palm opening and finger spreading could be improved for better fluid flow visualization.  Try to fully extend your fingers and maintain a wider hand opening during the exhalation phase.

The fist clenching and hand opening need more coordination with your breathing.  Ensure you make a tight fist during inhalation and fully open your hand during exhalation, visualizing the fluid movement.

The repetition consistency needs improvement. While you completed the repetitions, the MAE values suggest inconsistent muscle engagement and hand movements. Focus on smooth transitions between fist clenching and hand opening.

exercise_summary: You attempted the overhead pumping exercise, but consistency in arm extension and hand movements needs work.  Focus on fully extending your arm, opening your hand wide, and coordinating your breathing with fist clenching and opening. Remember to visualize the fluid moving with each pump.
